response.overview: Sukgyung Lee, 61, lives in an old municipal apartment in Seongsan-dong. The sunlight streams deep into the living room and the living room window is full of greenery from early spring to late fall, and every day, she hangs iron bars, runs along the river, and takes care of her elderly cat. Until she arrived at her current home, Lee had moved twenty-five times. It's slated for redevelopment, and she doesn't know when she'll have to leave again. At the age of 61, Lee wonders, "Where and how will I live in the future?" and begins a journey through the "paths of living place" of six women.
response.title: Six Stories in Her Place
